page.title: 17A FAMILY SUNDAY
page.content: My name is Chloe and I am 11 years old.I have a sister who is 9. This is a typical Sunday in the life of my family.We usually get up at about 9.30 am.but sometimes dad has to be up by 5.0 am.in order to go to work because he is on shifts.Our dad works at the I.C.I.factory.Our mum doesn't go to work because she has to look after my sister and me. We play outside if it is a nice day but if it's raining, we play quiz games or practise our violin and cello.We have dinner at 12.30.It is usually a snack but sometimes we have a Sunday dinner consisting of roast beef or chicken,roast potatoes,carrots and peas,pudding or fruit.After dinner we go and play or read books.I don't like the washing-up. We have tea about 5.0 pm.Then we stay inside and watch t.v.Bedtime is about 8.0 pm.
